titles.title: Recognizing October 2024 as "American Pharmacists Month" in honor of the contribution of pharmacists to provide safe, accessible, affordable, and beneficial patient care services and products to all residents and protect the public health of our communities.

Recognizing October 2024 as "American Pharmacists Month" in honor of the contribution of pharmacists to provide safe, accessible, affordable, and beneficial patient care services and products to all residents and protect the public health of our communities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes American Pharmacists Month.
